summary: CURRENT OWNER OF THIS VEHICLE, VICTOR CIOBANAS, ROLLED BACK ODOMETER TWICE IN THE LAST YEAR, 50000 MILES EACH TIME, AND SEVERAL TIMES BEFORE. I WAS WORKING ON THIS TRUCK AS A DRIVER. OWNER SAID HE DID IT FOR WARRANTY IN DEALERSHIP. NOW ODOMETER SHOWS AROUND 80000 MILES, WHILE THE REAL MILEAGE IS AROUND 300000 MILES. HE DID IT AT 8270 S 86TH CT., JUSTICE, IL, "ANDY'S AUTO ELECTRONICS", 12 JUNE 2019.
